name: Bob Survival
description:
Help Bob to rescue people.
Survival mode; holds and rescue as many people as you can.
You can use different types of weapons, grenades, mines and a chainsaw.
Pixel art graphics.
How many zombies can kill?
How many people can rescue?


With GameCenter.
Free with iAds.
This is a small version of the game Bob & Beyond Doors, search for it.
Please vote, and if you have any questions please contact me.
Remember, I'm a single person in the development of this game. 100% indie.

See Bob & Beyond Doors, other game with this Survival mode and new Arcade mode.
